title: Failed to run Erigon for BSC in mac M1
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`


```
$ ./build/bin/erigon --version
erigon version 2022.99.99-dev-163e422e
```

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX

OSX

Commit hash : 

```
163e422e843c81af66bb1c8bbdc4a2cf8247289d
```



#### Expected behaviour

runs weel

#### Actual behaviour

crashed


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


> start downloader 

```
./build/bin/downloader --downloader.api.addr=127.0.0.1:2208
```

> start erigon

```bash
./build/bin/erigon --chain=bsc --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:2207 --downloader.api.addr=0.0.0.0:2208
```
